member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE
member.summary: The CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE structure contains information about an image logotype.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE.LogotypeDetails
member.summary: A structure that contains additional information about the image.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE.pLogotypeImageInfo
member.summary: The address of a structure that contains the image information.
